stimulusHtml: According to the sentence, which of the following best describes the teacher’s actions?

features.html:
Fabula a discipulis lecta, magister pauca obscura explicabat, 

quod discipuli multa non intellexerunt.

choicesHtml: After the teacher explained what the students had read, the students still did not understand it.
The teacher chose an obscure story for the students to read because they were very intelligent.
The teacher explained a few things so that all the students understood the story they were about to read.
The students read a story but didn’t understand all of it, so the teacher explained some obscure things.
